timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the operation was performed

directory.description: Directory where the files are located ie. /path/to/files

match.description: Glob pattern to match files ie. *.txt or image_*.png

regex.description: Regular expression pattern to identify parts of the filename to be replaced

pattern.description: Renaming pattern using regex groups ie. 'new_name_\1.txt' where \1 is the first captured group

operations.description: List of changes to be made
